articles.author: CQN Magazine
articles.description: MICHAEL BEALE has been given the boot – after just 10 months in charge of the Ibrox club. That defeat followed Celtic winning 1-0 at the same venue at the start [...]

articles.description: YOU would have got long odds on Matt O’Riley being Celtic’s top goalscorer going into October. And McGregor may have remembered an afternoon from December 2016 when he also revelled [...]
